{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3301505,"name":"ori","username":"revthunder","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/r/2bfe46/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-02-04T13:06:24.002Z","cooked":"

im using OV 9782 arducams, model type is B0385.
one of my cables jst has a problem, im looking to buy a new one jst connector
I cant find a link for it
the female type is S4B-ZR(LF)(SN)
help will be apricated to find a link to buy the male vesrion and female version of the jst

First off, I would honestly just solder the cable directly to the solder pads where the connector sits. I hate that thing. If you want a new cable, email Uctronics (Arducam distributor) and Arducam directly to get new ones. I recommend asking for a few.

You should use a camera housing with some strain relief like the one linked in this folder Coprocessor - Google Drive
